markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Parting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4790) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 6), [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238) (Level 6)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon or a ranged weapon with reload 0

</column>

---

You jump back and make a quick shot that catches your opponent by surprise. You Step and then make a ranged Strike with the required weapon. Your target is off-guard against the attack.
name: Parting Shot
requirement: You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon or a ranged weapon with reload 0
requirement_markdown: You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon or a ranged weapon with reload 0
